title: Two-wheeler makers plan new launches in mid-size bike segment to challenge Royal Enfield's dominance
description: In July, Hero MotoCorp will introduce its first motorcycle developed in collaboration with Harley Davidson. It is slated to be among the most affordable products from the stable of the cult American bike maker. Also on the cards are the next generation KTM 390 Duke from the house of Bajaj, Aprilia RS 440, Yamaha MT-03 and YZF-R3.
